title: In dlc.evaluate_network(....) Error: No module named 'ruamel.yaml.scalarfloat'
body:
Hi all,
I'ḿ using DLC in Ubuntu 16.04 / Python Env Anaconda / DeepLabCut 2.1.3

But the error comes whime I'ḿ in Docker (DeepLabCut 2.0.4)

Training_network (done nicely!), I get an error during network evaluation (inside Docker):
```
>> In dlc.evaluate_network(....) Error: No module named 'ruamel.yaml.scalarfloat'

Any clues...?

###########################################################################
In [25]: deeplabcut.evaluate_network(path_config,Shuffles=[1], plotting=True)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ModuleNotFoundError                       Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-25-10c843813783> in <module>()
----> 1 deeplabcut.evaluate_network(path_config,Shuffles=[1], plotting=True)

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/evaluate.py in evaluate_network(config, Shuffles, plotting, show_errors, comparisonbodyparts, gputouse)
    105             path_test_config = Path(modelfolder) / 'test' / 'pose_cfg.yaml'
    106             # Load meta data
--> 107             data, trainIndices, testIndices, trainFraction=auxiliaryfunctions.LoadMetadata(os.path.join(cfg["project_path"],metadatafn))
    108 
    109             try:

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/deeplabcut/utils/auxiliaryfunctions.py in LoadMetadata(metadatafile)
    169 def LoadMetadata(metadatafile):
    170     with open(metadatafile, 'rb') as f:
--> 171         [trainingdata_details, trainIndexes, testIndexes,testFraction_data]= pickle.load(f)
    172         return trainingdata_details, trainIndexes, testIndexes, testFraction_data
    173 

ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'ruamel.yaml.scalarfloat'
```
